### 1. Rebranding & Evolution

- As of November 15, 2023, **Power Virtual Agents** officially became part of the newly introduced **Microsoft Copilot Studio**, marking a pivotal shift in Microsoft’s conversational AI strategy.
- This isn’t merely a renaming—it’s a transformation into a broader, more powerful platform that incorporates generative AI, multi-channel deployment, and deep integration across Microsoft 365 and Azure ecosystems.

### 2. Expanded Capabilities & AI Advancements

- **Generative AI & Natural Language Understanding (NLU):** While PVA primarily relied on predefined triggers and templates, Copilot Studio introduces AI-generated responses using GPT-based models. You can create or modify conversational topics simply by describing your needs in natural language.
- **Plugin & Data Integration:** Copilot Studio enables seamless connections to your data via pre-built or custom plugins—whether through Azure, APIs, Microsoft 365, or third-party sources—allowing for richer, actionable chatbot experiences.
- **Workflow & Agent Orchestration:** The platform supports orchestrated, multi-step agent workflows managed centrally—far exceeding PVA’s simpler, topic-based bots.

### 3. Broader Deployment & Reach

- Agents built in Copilot Studio can now be deployed across a wide variety of channels—including websites, mobile apps, Teams, Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, and beyond—extending far beyond PVA’s typical scope.

### 4. Licensing & User Impact

- Existing PVA customers enjoy **no disruptions**: all their bots and work continue to function, now under the Copilot Studio interface.
- The **PVA license** has been replaced by the **Copilot Studio license**, offering the same functionality plus new generative AI capabilities.
- Flexible pricing is offered via capacity-based messaging packs ($200/month per 25,000 messages) or pay-as-you-go billing—both inclusive of full product capability.

### 5. Cutting-Edge Automation via “Computer Use”

- In April 2025, Microsoft launched a game-changing **“computer use”** feature in Copilot Studio: AI agents can now interact directly with websites and desktop apps—clicking buttons, typing into fields, and adapting dynamically if UI elements change—even when no API is available.

### 6. Customer Stories & Use Cases

- Organizations like the **Miami Dolphins**, **Kobe City (Japan)**, and **Rabobank** previously built effective solutions using PVA.
- With Copilot Studio, broader adoption is visible: **Pets at Home**, **Holland America Line**, **Virgin Money**, **Nsure.com**, and **ABN AMRO** have praised its ability to accelerate complex, AI-driven agent creation across channels.

## Summary Table: PVA vs. Copilot Studio

| Feature / Capability | Power Virtual Agents (PVA) | Copilot Studio | | --- | --- | --- | | **Branding & Platform** | Standalone chatbot tool on Power Platform | Fully integrated conversational AI studio | | **Conversational Logic** | Trigger phrases, topics, templates | Generative AI + NLU-enabled topic generation | | **Integration** | Basic connectors via Power Automate, etc. | Deep plugin support and data integration | | **Deployment Channels** | Limited (e.g., Teams, web) | Web, mobile apps, Teams, MS 365, custom apps | | **Licensing** | PVA-specific license | Copilot Studio license with pay-as-you-go options | | **Enhanced Automation** | No direct UI automation | “Computer use” feature for UI-level automation | | **Continuity for Users** | N/A | Smooth transition—existing bots active in Studio |

## What This Means for Businesses & Users

- **PVA users:** You’re in good shape—your bots are still working, now under Copilot Studio, with expanded AI functionality and better cross-channel reach.
- **New users:** Copilot Studio offers low-code ease, rich integration, workflow orchestration, generative intelligence, and powerful automation features—making it far more versatile than the legacy PVA.
- **Best of both worlds:** You retain the simplicity and accessibility of PVA but gain modern, scalable AI enhancements.

In essence, **Copilot Studio is the next-generation evolution of Power Virtual Agents**—a leap forward in conversational AI. It preserves PVA’s low-code appeal while unlocking advanced generative capabilities, broader integrations, richer deployment options, and innovative automation tools. Whether for internal tools, customer service, or complex workflows, Copilot Studio is where AI-driven virtual assistants now thrive.
